title: Looking at Asteroids Close to Earth

previous.title: Looking at Asteroids Close to Earth

next.title: Looking at Asteroids Close to Earth

content: Use the controls at the bottom of the OrbitViewer to watch the motion of asteroid Bennu and the planets as they orbit around the Sun. Adjust the Time Step by clicking the speedometer. Press the play/pause button when Bennu is located on the blue orbit of Earth. (If you overshoot you can use the “step backward” button.)

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Will Bennu hit Earth when their orbits cross? Explain your reasoning.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Could Bennu hit Earth in the next ten years?
